sentence.Network_en: For some people, competing is the be-all and end-all of their running.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于有些人来说，赛跑的全部意义就是竞争。

sentence.Network_en: It was going to be a party to end all parties.
Her boy - friend is the be - all and end - all of her existence.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的男朋友就是她生活中最重要的内容.

sentences.sentence: "human beings are not the end-all of evolution"
